TopicTitle: Building VABs and Launchpads on other Planets and Moons

Articles.Content: So I thought that it would be really cool to be able to have VABs and Launchpads and maybe spaceplane stuff on other planets/moons. But it could cost a lot of money so that it isn't OP. I thought that it could be unlocked in the tech tree and it could be a part that is like a compartment with the materials that the kerbals could build to make the building. And their could be a different part for each building. Their wouldn't have to be mining involved or anything although it could go with it. Although it would probably weigh a lot so getting to your destination would be harder.
I'm trying not to be rude here, but your suggestion is on the "What not to suggest" list...
Yes it is, Squad is well aware of the idea
